data.title: SA 3.0) To request other use: Integrating DSpace.
meta_keywords: Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: Integrating DSpace.
data.meta_description: Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: Primary Use Cases – Backup & Restore of DSpace Content All content or just partial (Community/Collection/Item) – Migration/Export of DSpace Content All content or just partial (Community/Collection/Item) – DuraCloud Integration Offsite backup & restore of content Intro to Archival Info Pkgs (1.7+)
data.text:
Presentation on theme: "Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: Integrating DSpace."— Presentation transcript:

1 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Integrating DSpace with DuraCloud DuraSpace Webinar: 30 Nov 2011 Tim Donohue DuraSpace

2 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org 1.DSpace AIP Backup & Restore (1.7 +) (Initial DuraCloud use case: Backup & Restore) 2.DSpace Curation Task System (1.7 +) 3.DSpace Replication Task Suite (1.8 add-on) Basis for DSpace Integration

3 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Primary Use Cases – Backup & Restore of DSpace Content All content or just partial (Community/Collection/Item) – Migration/Export of DSpace Content All content or just partial (Community/Collection/Item) – DuraCloud Integration Offsite backup & restore of content Intro to Archival Info Pkgs (1.7+)

4 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org How to Backup DSpace (pre-1.7) Full Database Backup Folder Backup Database Assetstore Folder

5 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org How to Restore All (pre-1.7) Full Database Backup Folder Backup Database Assetstore Folder

6 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org How to Restore a Collection (pre-1.7) Full Database Backup Folder Backup Database Assetstore Folder Temporary Database Temporary Folder?

7 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org How to Restore a Collection (pre-1.7) Full Database Backup Folder Backup Database Assetstore Folder Temporary Database Temporary Folder? TOO DIFFICULT

8 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Backup via Archival Info Pkgs Package for each Community, Collection & Item AIP backup

9 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Restore All via Archival Info Pkgs AIP backup Package for each Community, Collection & Item

10 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Restore a Collection via AIPs AIP backup Collection AIP Items in Collection 1 2

11 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org What’s in an AIP? METS (DIM / MODS / PREMIS / METSRights) License Content Files or Logos *Also a BagIt version (Replication Suite add-on) Other Files in Bundles (optional) Archival Information Package (AIP)

12 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org What’s in an AIP? Descriptive Metadata: DIM & MODS Tech/Preservation Metadata: PREMIS Related Object AIPs METS (DIM / MODS / PREMIS / METSRights) License Content Files or Logos Other Files in Bundles (optional) Rights Metadata: METSRights

13 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org The “Site” AIP Top-Level Community AIPs METS (DIM / MODS / PREMIS / METSRights) Special AIP for site-wide info/metadata: (e.g. Group Memberships, EPeople)

14 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Restore All In-Archive Content (Files + Metadata) Restore All People & Groups Restore All Permissions / Access Rights Restore Community / Collection Logos, Metadata, Rights & Item Templates Restore Community / Collection / Item Hierarchy Restore In-Process / Incomplete Items Restore Collection OAI-PMH/ORE Harvest Settings Restore all configuration files (dspace.cfg, etc.) What can AIPs restore?

15 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org AIP Use Case: Migrate Content 3 4 Items in Collection One DSpace InstallAnother DSpace Install Collection AIP 1 2

16 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Package for each Community, Collection & Item “Manual” AIP backup to DuraCloud Local “Watch” Folder 1 2 DuraCloud Sync Tool./dspace packager -d java -jar synctool.jar [1] [2] This two step route is required for DSpace 1.7.x

17 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org “Manual” AIP restore from DuraCloud Package for each Community, Collection & Item Local Folder 1 2 DuraCloud Retrieval Tool java -jar retrievaltool.jar./dspace packager -r [1] [2] This two step route is required for DSpace 1.7.x

18 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org New: DSpace Replication Suite add-on

19 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Enables a basic ‘microservices’ approach to curating DSpace objects Anyone can build a task & share it Currently tasks must be written in Java – Experimental support for non-Java tasks in 1.8 “Frees” admin tasks from Command Line – Can now run from Admin UI or CLI – Can also “queue” tasks for later processing Intro to DSpace Curation System

20 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org In DSpace 1.8.0, ANY curation task run across your entire DSpace site will report a “NullPointerException” error THIS DOES NOT MEAN YOUR TASK FAILED! Check dspace logs to see if task did succeed This bug will be fixed in 1.8.1 – https://jira.duraspace.org/browse/DS-1077 DSpace 1.8.0 WARNING

21 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org A set of curation tasks geared towards ‘replicating’ (backup/restore/audit) content Compatible with DSpace 1.8.1 or above – Not recommended on 1.8.0 (see previous slide) “Wraps” DSpace AIP Backup & Restore tool Provides configurable AIP storage plugins for filesystem or DuraCloud Provides optional BagIt packaged AIPs DSpace Replication Suite Add-on

22 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org The Suite of Tasks Transmit AIP(s) Verify AIP(s) exist Fetch AIP(s) Audit against AIP(s) Remove AIP(s) Restore Missing Object(s) from AIP(s) Replace Existing Object(s) from AIP(s) Read Odometer (I/O upload/download stats) Estimate storage size of AIP(s) (rough estimate) All tasks can be configured to store AIPs in an existing DuraCloud account. Local/Mounted filesystem storage is also supported.

23 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Package for each Community, Collection & Item Backup AIP to DuraCloud Local Temp Folder (Temporary Cache) OR Command lineCuration Tools 1 Replication Task Suite: One step process: Generate and Upload AIP Via UI or CLI 1

24 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Package for each Community, Collection & Item Restore AIP from DuraCloud Local Temp Folder (Temporary Cache) OR Command lineCuration Tools Replication Task Suite: One step process: Retrieve and Restore AIP Via UI or CLI Also ‘auditing’ tools 1 1

25 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org DSpace Replication Suite Demo

26 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Cannot yet take advantage of DuraCloud streaming capabilities (AIPs are zip files) Cannot yet take advantage of DuraCloud transformation services (AIPs are zip files) Known Limitations

27 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Early December (likely by Mon, Dec 5) This release is for early adopters to try out add-on & provide feedback Download from Replication Task Suite page: https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/DSPACE/ReplicationTaskSuite Install & Configuration instructions also on above page “Early Access” Release

28 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org MIT : Richard Rodgers & Wendy Bossons – Developed Curation Task Framework – Developed initial Replication Suite tasks (BagIt versions) @mire : Mark Diggory – Gave feedback throughout early development In Large Thanks to…

29 Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 Unported License (CC BY-SA 3.0) To request other use: info@duracloud.org Replication Task Suite: – https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/DSPACE/ReplicationTaskSuite AIP Backup & Restore: – https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/DSDOC18/AIP+Backup+and+Restore Curation Task System: – https://wiki.duraspace.org/display/DSDOC18/Curation+System For More Information
